title: Yandaki Oda
overview: The series begins with the marriage story of Verda YaldÄ±z, a famous economics program host, and Fikret Alabey, one of the country's wealthy business people, who is a guest on her program. Verda and Fikret's marriage, which surprises everyone and makes a big splash in the tabloid press, will turn into a big test for their families.
